snippet: With political action on curbing greenhouse gases stalled, a bipartisan panel is recommending a radical fix: directly manipulating the Earth’s climate to lower temperatures.
lead_paragraph: With political action on curbing greenhouse gases stalled, a bipartisan panel is recommending a radical fix: directly manipulating the Earth’s climate to lower temperatures.

headline.main: Group Urges Research Into Aggressive Efforts to Fight Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Group Urges Research Into Aggressive Efforts to Fight Climate Change
headline.seo: Group Urges Research Into Efforts to Halt Climate Change
